subtitle: These parcels make an ideal dinner party meal and are guaranteed to impress your friends. serve with salad and mayonnaise.

method.text: Roll out the pastry on a lightly floured surface. For each serving, cut one 13 cm (5in)  square and one 10cm (4in) square.
Place the smaller squares on a floured baking tray. Top each with a piece of salmon.
Mix together the creme fraiche, dill and seasoning. Spread over the top of the salmon pieces.
Use the remaining squares to cover the salmon, moistening the edges with a little water to seal. Press down and flute the edges. Score the top in a criss-cross pattern.
Glaze the parcels with the beaten egg.
Bake in the oven for 20 min or until puffed up and golden.

title: Salmon, dill and creme fraiche pillows
